name: Kananaskis Country Trail Guide 4th Edition Volume 5
categories: Kananaskis Country Trail Guide 4th Edition Vo
description: Kananaskis Country is a huge multi-use recreation region in Alberta with parks, campgrounds, and hiking trails. This guide zones in on a specific part of Kananaskis Country, and covers the Highwood, Flat Creek, Upper Livingstone, and Willow Creek areas. It includes clear and detailed trail descriptions with maps and colour photos, so that novice or experienced hikers can safely walk, backpack, and scramble their way through meadows, forests, and mountains.
